worksContents.title: TT Manager
worksContents.description: TT Manager is a simple time tracker to help you remember how long you spent on each task. Just log your work quickly, and use the records for better time estimation and review.

worksContents.title: PyYorozuya
worksContents.description: PyYorozuya is a multifunctional utility tool that supports daily tasks such as file name retrieval, string replacement, grep, file renaming, and line counting. It is named after the Japanese word for “jack-of-all-trades.”

worksContents.title: test003
worksContents.description: This is a test description for test003.
